Package view

Class UserInterface

java.lang.Object
view.UserInterface
Direct Known Subclasses:
StaffInterface, StudentInterface
public abstract class UserInterface extends Object
The UserInterface class is an abstract class providing a template for user interfaces in the application. It includes methods to prompt password change, display header information, and abstract methods for specific interface implementations.

  • Constructor Details

    • UserInterface

      public UserInterface()

  • Method Details

    • promptChangePswd

      public static void promptChangePswd()
      Prompts the user to change their password from the default one for security reasons. The user can choose to change the password immediately or do it later.

    • showTopmostHeader

      public void showTopmostHeader()
      Displays the topmost header of the user interface. This method prints a fixed title "Profile" at the top of the interface.

    • showByLine

      public abstract void showByLine()
      Abstract method to display specific byline information. Implementations of this method should provide specific byline content for different user interfaces.

    • showProfileHeader

      public abstract void showProfileHeader()
      Abstract method to display the user's profile header. Implementations of this method should provide specific header content based on the user's profile details.

    • showMenuPage

      public abstract void showMenuPage()
      Abstract method to display the main menu page. Implementations of this method should provide specific menu options relevant to the user's role and functionalities.

    • showWholePage

      public void showWholePage()
      Combines various display components to show the complete page. This method orchestrates the display of the topmost header, profile header, byline, and the main menu page.
